data.text: You people who live in the holy city of Jerusalem [APO], wake up!
People of Jerusalem, get up from humbly sitting in the dust
because this is what Yahweh says:
Yahweh our Lord also says this:
But now think about what is happening:
But my people will then have a close relationship with [MTY] me,
It is a wonderful thing when messengers [MTY] arrive on the mountains/hills,
The watchmen who are guarding the city will shout and sing joyfully,
Yahweh will show all the nations that he is holy and powerful.
So, leave the places where you were taken to when you were captured,
But it will not be necessary for you to leave suddenly,
But many people will be appalled when they see what has happened to him.
But he will cause people of many nations to be surprised;
